name: Congenial Octo Barnacle
description:
Congenial Octo Barnacle is a additive space shooter game where you can consume your enemy after killing them

Compete for a high score on the online leader-board

become stronger by consuming your enemy's to level up one of the 4 player attributes 

Burstshot - fire a quickfire burst of ammo by holding down the fire key
Explosive - your bullets have a chance to explode on contact with a target doing damage to everyone nearby
Healthboost - increase your max health
Rebound - your bullets bounce off more walls

Controls

KB/Mouse

Mouse - Aim
WASD - Move

Space/Left Click - Shoot

Controller

Left stick - Move

Right stick - Aim

Triggers - Shoot
